img_above_text:
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(39\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/bc/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2839%29.png)
Turn and face the opposite direction and deal with the archer on the stairs to the right first. Climb up the stairs to reach a wooden structure, where you can find the first Meditation Spot of the Chapter.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the video game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing a character climbing wooden stairs to reach a wooden structure. This structure is identified as the first Meditation Spot of the chapter, located in the Woods Ember area. The setting is dark and rugged, with stone stairs and a distant archer visible, indicating a challenging environment.
